Literature.Title: Arylomycins A and B, new biaryl-bridged lipopeptide antibiotics produced by Streptomyces sp. Tü 6075. I. Taxonomy, fermentation, isolation and biological activities.
Literature.Author: Schimana J, Gebhardt K, Höltzel A, Schmid DG, Süssmuth RD, Müller J, Pukall R, Fiedler HP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Arthrobacter globiformis DSM 20124(MIC=100µM),Arthrobacter oxydans DSM 6612(MIC=>100µM),Arthrobacter pascens DSM 20545(MIC=100µM),Rhodococcus erythropolis DSM 1069(MIC=3µM),Streptomyces viridochromogenes Tű 57(MIC=30µM),Brevibacillus brevis DSM 30T(MIC=30µM),Escherichia coli K-12(no activity data),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 35501(no activity data),Pseudomonas fluorescens DSM 50090(no activity data),Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 9080(no activity data),Botrytis cinerea Tű 157(no activity data)
